1516910.name: Exigent
1516910.description:
Exigent is Keahunui Technologies first commercial game. In this pseudo satyr survival game, set in an evacuated spacecraft you must try to keep the ship together long enough to crash land on LS-689999999 the nearest habitable planet. With no other escape pods and no other choice, all you can do is hope to survive.

The game is designed to make the player choose between bad and worse options as they desperately try survive while repairing the ship with what they can carry.
1516910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
